signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for better control and visibility over emails sent and received by instructors using shared inboxes.
signals.customer_ask: Will we be able to have more control over those, see what emails are being sent and received?
signals.context: Team of instructors managing class-related inquiries through shared inboxes.

signals.problem_statement: The customer wants to create email aliases for instructors instead of using individual emails.
signals.customer_ask: Would our instructors then sign in to Gmail with the training email rather than their individual emails?
signals.context: Team of instructors managing class-related inquiries.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure about the internal communication capabilities within the product.
signals.customer_ask: Can you create a chat between us and another employee?
signals.context: Team of instructors managing class-related inquiries.
